definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
lit. to meet face to face on a narrow path (idiom)/fig. enemies or rivals meet face to face

sentences.english: By putting the seven great nails on the narrow paths of samsara and nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 將七根大釘釘於輪迴與涅盤之狹路上。

sentences.english: Then use the tip of the squeegee to clear a narrow strip at the top.
sentences.chinese: 然後用清潔刷的頂端從頂部開一小塊狹長條。

sentences.english: Teichoscopia and claustrophobia are two techniques employed by Henrik Ibsen in his dramatic works.
sentences.chinese: 透牆而視與恐狹效應是易卜生戲劇的兩大技巧。

sentences.english: Over the mountains on its Qiao Youlin risk, not the poor, also narrow.

sentences.english: This paper reports the male genitalia of two species of Stenhomalus.
sentences.chinese: 本文記述兩種狹天牛的雄性外生殖器結構。

sentences.english: He again beheld the dull light vainly endeavoring to penetrate the narrow opening .

sentences.chinese: 胸襟狹誣的人，有時使我泄氣。
